item.title: Major League Wrestling Gets Grip on Danny McBride’s Don Gato Tequila
item.description: In what may be a first for the wild, wooly world of professional wrestling, an actor will play the role of a character associated with his boutique tequila brand in a bid to rally the promotion’

item.title: Major League Wrestling Gets Grip on Danny McBride’s Don Gato Tequila
item.description: In what may be a first for the wild, wooly world of professional wrestling, an actor will play the role of a character associated with his boutique tequila brand in a bid to rally the promotion’
